mutants.original_line: hex_str = guid_str.replace("-", "")  # Remove hyphens from the GUID string
mutants.code:
def guidToBinary(guid_str):
    hex_str = guid_str.replace('', '')
    hex_bytes = bytes.fromhex(hex_str)
    return hex_bytes

mutants.original_line: hex_str = guid_str.replace("-", "")  # Remove hyphens from the GUID string
mutants.code:
def guidToBinary(guid_str):
    hex_str = guid_str.replace('-', 'MUTATED')
    hex_bytes = bytes.fromhex(hex_str)
    return hex_bytes
